column4: hi all... I got the "Blue screen of death" when I tried to upgrade to dapper... I saw this: http://www.ubuntu.com/FixForUpgradeIssue and did everything it says, but I still get the bluescreen when I boot into Ubuntu... any help?
what kind of video card do you have?
not sure... how do I check?
